data.oai_dc:dc: Stopping sites and stopover timing of satellite-tracked great knots in East Asia

The datafile contains coastal stopping sites of great knots tracked with solar Argos satellite transmitters during 2015-2017, and their respective arrival and departure times at each site. The transmitters were deployed in Roebuck Bay, Australia, and were operating on an 8 h on and 25 h off duty cycle. For further details, see README file.
Great Knot|East Asian-Australasian Flyway|intertidal mudflats|migration|satellite telemetry|stopover site
